title: All 32 - Atlanta Falcons: How Dan Quinn can save his job plus Todd Gurley expectations with D. Orlando Ledbetter (Football 6/18)
description:
The Falcons seemingly have the talent, but can they put it all together for a return to the postseason? D. Orlando Ledbetter of the Atlanta Journal-Constitution joins guest host John Breech to discuss the team's outlook in 2020. They analyze Dan Quinn's job security (2:15) and Todd Gurley's health (4:45), along with hopes for his production, D. Orlando also breaks down the Falcons defense (8:00), potential position battles (11:30) and how Vegas is approaching the team (13:30). Listen as we continue to catch up with every team in the NFL.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.

itunes:subtitle: Dan Quinn managed to save his job last season with a strong finish, but what will it take to stick around after 2020? D. Orlando Ledbetter of the Atlanta Journal-Constitution answers for us.
